title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah in Southern Lebanon: Key Targets Hit Amid Ongoing Tensions”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked Hezbollah targets in southern Lebanon overnight.

Fighter jets attacked targets belonging to the terrorist organization Hezbollah in southern Lebanon throughout the night. Among the targets that were hit was a military structure belonging to Hezbollah in the Mahrun area, alongside operational and terrorist infrastructure of the organization in the villages of Killa and al-Khiam in southern Lebanon.

As a result of an anti-tank missile strike last night (Sunday) in the Metula area, two IDF reservists, members of the alert squad, were injured, one seriously and the other lightly.

The alert squad members were evacuated for medical treatment at a hospital, and their families have been updated.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/4bjj0ky
